meanings.sent1: The diver submersed into the deep blue sea.
meanings.sent2: The ship submersed after hitting an iceberg.
meanings.sent3: The curious fish submersed themselves to explore the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were submersed in a sea of memories.
meanings.sent5: The sunken ship was submersed in history and mystery.

meanings.definition: To be covered or flooded with water.
meanings.sent1: The town was submersed in heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent2: The fields were submersed after the river overflowed its banks.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was submersed in bubbles as the kids did the dishes.
meanings.sent4: The memories submersed her mind like a tidal wave.
meanings.sent5: The garden was submersed in a sea of colorful flowers after the rain.

meanings.definition: To immerse or plunge into water.
meanings.sent1: She submersed her feet in the cool stream on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: The chef submersed the vegetables in a pot of boiling water.
meanings.sent3: The puppy submersed its whole body in the muddy puddle.
meanings.sent4: His mind was submersed in the music, forgetting all else.
meanings.sent5: The artist submersed the brush in vibrant paint to create a masterpiece.
